mapper.select: select placeName, max(pickCount) as pickCount, max(lat) as lat, max(lng) as lng, address from planMap group by placeName, address order by pickCount desc
mapper.insert: insert into planMap values (#{planNo, javaType=int}, #{id, javaType=String}, #{pickCount, javaType=int}, #{userColor, javaType=String}, #{placeName, javaType=String}, #{lat, javaType=double}, #{lng, javaType=double}, #{address, javaType=String})
